title: Rumored Mischief
description: After being orphaned at the age of 17 and left with only her younger sister for company, Paige Matheson had two best friends. Danny and Parker. Rumors fly a few years later after Paige is seen on a date with a man people believe is married - Parker, who refuses to take her phone calls when people start gossiping and asking questions. Paige flees to the west coast, vowing not to return, though her resolution changes six years after her flight as her sister, Emmeline prepares to marry Danny, only now, Paige has her own past when she comes face to face with all of the people she left behind... This is a SHORT, CLEAN romance.
author: Megan Swanson
